subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Phoenix Suns forward Boris Diaw hit the game-winning seven-foot turnaround jumper over Mavericks forward Jerry Stackhouse with a half-second left to triumph over Dallas.
snippet: Phoenix Suns forward Boris Diaw hit the game-winning seven-foot turnaround jumper over Mavericks forward Jerry Stackhouse with a half-second left to triumph over Dallas.
